name: Tech Support: Error Unknown
detailed_description:
Become a leading Tech Support specialist as you resolve customer issues. Hack your system to unlock its potential, GPS track lost phones, scan profiles to blackmail customers, or simply propose they reboot. Climb the corporate ladder or secretly join the rogue hacktivist group, the choice is yours.

Key features

  • Solve a series of technical problems
  • Blackmail customers for personal gain
  • Choose your friends wisely
  • Engage in procedural conversations
  • Hack your way to the truth
  • Rise above a simple tech support specialist

short_description: Become a leading Tech Support specialist as you resolve customer issues. Hack your system to unlock it's potential, GPS track lost phones, scan profiles to blackmail customers, or simply propose they reboot. Climb the corporate ladder or secretly join the rogue hacktivist group, the choice is yours.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or greater
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz CPU
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720 or better video resolution in High Color mode
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard onboard sound card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.6+
  • Processor: 2.20Ghz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720 or better video resolution in High Color mode
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard onboard sound card

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: i5-5200 2.20Ghz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720 or better video resolution in High Color mode
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
